pkgmetadata.longdescription: Likelihood Ratio Statistics for One or Two Sample T-Tests // Likelihood ratio and maximum likelihood statistics are provided that can be used as alternatives to p-values Colquhoun (2017) doi:10.1098/rsos.171085. Arguments can be either p-values or t-statistics. together with degrees of freedom. For the function 'tTOlr', the argument 'twoSided' has the default 'twoSided = TRUE'.
